EmailTemplate.name: CH-ES-02-22-2016-Webinar Invite.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Tomorrow: Assure the Performance of I/O Intensive Workloads
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/resources/5-it-predictions-2016/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=webinar-predictions-2016&utm_content=01062016> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Partner}}, You're invited to join us TOMORROW for a special webinar featuring EMC XtremIO to learn about how to assure the performance of I/O intensive workloads at scale. During this webinar you can expect to learn the following:
- How to assure application quality of service across all flash and heterogeneous storage environments - What does it take to enable massive mixed workload consolidation for multiple Tier 1 workloads - Why real-time automatable placement, sizing and provision decisions at every layer of the stack enable performance control - How you can provision 1000s of VMs instantly with no overhead, no SLA risk, and no infrastructure impact
- Why the hypervisor integrations matter for large-scale virtual environments
Save your spot by registering here <[[http://vmturbo.com/resources/vmturbo-xtremio-webinar?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=webinar-XtremIO-VMTurbo&utm_content=02222016]]> or using the button below. We look forward to seeing you on the webinar tomorrow, Wednesday, February 24, 2016 at 2:00 PM ET. <[[http://vmturbo.com/resources/vmturbo-xtremio-webinar?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=webinar-XtremIO-VMTurbo&utm_content=02222016]]>
- The VMTurbo Channel Team
